item.title: CONMED Corp 10-K
item.description: CONMED Corp, which is in the Electromedical & Electrotherapeutic Apparatus [3845] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 21, 2023 had 27510 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 366 instances million - 252 instances may - 207 instances december - 198 instances 10 - 191 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
